title: Cherry and dark chocolate loaf cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '200g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '300g glace cherries, halved', '200g self raising flour', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder', 'For the icing', '100g dark chocolate, melted', '55g unsalted butter, melted', '55g icing sugar']
